level.heading: APPLICANTS EDUCATED IN FOREIGN COUNTRIES (ยง 17-4703)

level.text: The Board may grant a license to practice acupuncture to an applicant who has completed an educational program in a foreign country, who demonstrates to the satisfaction of the Board the following:
That the program is substantially equivalent to one of the programs required by this chapter and the Act; and
That the applicant otherwise meets all the requirements of this chapter and the Act.
An applicant under this section who does not speak English as a native language shall be required ‘to receive a passing score on an English competency test approved by the Board.
